game.name: Summer Delusion: The Girl Only I Can See
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A visual novel intertwining elements of summer, love, mystery, featuring multiple choices and branching endings. I have a friend—but only I can see her. The doctor insists she’s a delusion, yet she claims to be from another world. Whose words can I truly trust? My choice will determine everything.
